lead_paragraph: Real Madrid forward Cristiano Ronaldo faces a race against time to be fit for the Champions League semi-final second leg with Manchester City on May 4.

headline.print_headline: Ronaldo Set to Miss Real Sociedad Game, Aiming to Be Fit Against Manchester City
headline.main: Ronaldo Set to Miss Real Sociedad Game, Aiming to Be Fit Against Manchester City

snippet: Real Madrid forward Cristiano Ronaldo faces a race against time to be fit for the Champions League semi-final second leg with Manchester City on May 4....
